(내가 일진이야?)\n\n  - Author: [kkom-i (꼼이)](https://mangadex.org/author/2c7243ac-5113-409e-8951-73b32ee83c6a)\n\n  - Artist: [Etui (에틔)](https://mangadex.org/author/b0957ad0-3afa-4fe7-b2f4-5733028b7b68)\n\n- **№8** The Perfect Scent/Aromatic Romance (이상향)\n\n  - Author/Artist: [Dona (도나)](https://mangadex.org/author/96d00301-99ac-4d85-94ab-74535789a9a5)\n\n---\n\n- [Original Webtoon \u003cLezhin\u003e](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/fetish_bl)\n\n---\n\n- [Official English Translation \u003cCopinComics\u003e](https://copincomics.com/toon/128)\n\n- [Official English Translation \u003cINKR\u003e](https://inkr.com/title/207-my-bl-tales)","ko":"너의 '그것'이 나를 참을 수 없게 만들어~! 본격 페티쉬 단편선!\n\n- 1\n마거릿 부인의 비밀공방 글: [어른용사탕](https://mangadex.org/author/e8da1578-e191-4147-815d-6cc08a5c0df5) / 그림:[율서](https://mangadex.org/author/51a1fb63-4048-41b5-8954-6f8c4d7f9160)\n\n  - : 천재 세공사 '젠'은 '마거릿 부인'의 비밀공방에서 부인만이 제공할 수 있는 '어떤 것'을 받는 대가로\n일을 한다. 그 '어떤 것'이란...?\n\n- 2\nLove and Fever (성인) 글.그림 / [여잉](https://mangadex.org/author/342aed75-7089-466b-be9e-2d24da47d7a1)\n\n  - : 연인 '하윤'에게 알바 대타를 부탁받은 '준우'는 '하윤'의 상태가 심상치 않음을 느끼고 '하윤'의 집으로 향한다. 문을 연 순간, 아니나 다를까...'하윤'의 상태가 이상하다?!\n\n- 3\n메이드 연쇄살인 사건 글.그림 / [고조](https://mangadex.org/author/5c925e91-2b5d-485e-a4bc-b780f1043ae6)\n\n  - : 19세기 영국을 닮은 사회적 성별의 구분이 미비한 또 다른 세계에서도 사용인 전성시대가 시작되지만,\n남성 '메이드'만을 노린 연쇄살인 사건이 일어난다! 사건 해결을 위해 '러셀'은 '엘리엇'을 메이드로 고용하는데!\n\n- 4\n달콤살벌한 그 무언가 글.그림/ [왕새우쵸밥](https://mangadex.org/author/9ab4bc6c-44c5-4d9a-866c-aa593c67e6c1)\n\n  - : '유한'은 '안재'에게 따뜻한 집과 음식, 아낌없는 애정을 모두 주지만 가족도 연인도 아니다.\n'안재'는 '유한'과의 관계에 대해 시간이 지날수록 혼란을 느끼는데....\n\n- 5\n네게 빠진 점. (성인) 글.그림/ [르미](https://mangadex.org/author/a41aee79-5620-4b9a-9ee0-2194467b69a7)\n\n  - : 눈물점이 있는 미인에게 약해도 너무 약한 '시연'은 역대급 이상형인 '은하'를 만난다!\n어떡하지? '은하'가 머릿속에서 떠나질 않아!\n\n- 6\nUnfixable 글.그림/ [인닌](https://mangadex.org/author/ade0be31-7673-4b5d-bfcd-e9d398d51697)\n\n  - : 자살을 결심하고 산에 오른 치과의사 '현영'은 삶의 끝자락에서 뜻밖의 SOS를 받는다.\n그런데 상대가... '호랑이' ?! 거기에 반짝이는 '그것'이 너무나도 아름답다?!\n\n- 7\n내가 일진이야? 글: [꼼이](https://mangadex.org/author/2c7243ac-5113-409e-8951-73b32ee83c6a) / 그림:[에틔](https://mangadex.org/author/b0957ad0-3afa-4fe7-b2f4-5733028b7b68)\n\n  - : 깡촌에 위치한 '오지 고등학교'로 전학 온 '세진'은 함께 전학 온 '은재'가 전설의 일진 짱인\n'왕손바닥'이라는 것을 눈치챈다. 하지만 학교에선 '왕손바닥'이 '세진'으로 알려지고!\n'은재'조차'세진'에게 말한다! \"\"너, 계속 왕손바닥 해라. 내가 네 빵셔틀 해줄게\"\"\n\n- 8\n이상향  글.그림/ [도나](https://mangadex.org/author/96d00301-99ac-4d85-94ab-74535789a9a5)\n\n---\n\n- [Original Webtoon \u003cLezhin\u003e](https://www.lezhin.com/ko/comic/fetish_bl)\n\n---\n\n- [Official English Translation \u003cCopinComics\u003e](https://copincomics.com/toon/128)\n\n- [Official English Translation \u003cINKR\u003e](https://inkr.com/title/207-my-bl-tales)"},"links":{"ap":"my-bl-tales","engtl":"https://comics.inkr.com/title/207-my-bl-tales?utm_source=mgd","mu":"158097","raw":"https://www.bomtoon.com/comic/ep_list/Fetish_BL_/?p_id=YumGumYum"},"originalLanguage":"ko","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3e2b8dae-350e-4ab8-a8ce-016e844b9f0d","name":{"en":"Long Strip"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"51d83883-4103-437c-b4b1-731cb73d786c","name":{"en":"Anthology"}},{"id":"5920b825-4181-4a17-beeb-9918b0ff7a30","name":{"en":"Boys' Love"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"e197df38-d0e7-43b5-9b09-2842d0c326dd","name":{"en":"Web Comic"}},{"id":"f5ba408b-0e7a-484d-8d49-4e9125ac96de","name":{"en":"Full Color"}}]}

Incapaz de soportar esto, se encerró en casa sin querer salir ni volver a ver a sus compañeros y durante años el miedo a salir creció y creció, acabando por convertirse en una carga para su familia… hasta el día en que sus padres murieron y sus hermanos lo expulsaron de su hogar por el parásito en el que se había convertido. En ese momento, aunque tarde, se arrepintió de su actitud y se puso a pensar que su vida podría haber sido decente si él le hubiera puesto más esfuerzo. Justo cuando estaba a punto de iniciar su nuevo cambio, ve un camión en movimiento a gran velocidad dirigiéndose a tres estudiantes de secundaria. Reuniendo todas las fuerzas que tenía logra salvarlos, pero a cambio él termina siendo atropellado por el camión, muriendo al instante. Cuando abrió los ojos, él había reencarnado en un mundo de espadas y magia como Rudeus Greyrat. Nacido en este nuevo mundo, con una nueva vida, Rudeus decidió que, “Esta vez, realmente voy a vivir mi vida al máximo sin arrepentimientos”. De este modo se inicia el viaje de un hombre que anhela reiniciar su vida.","ru":"34-летнего отаку-затворника выгнали из дома родственники после похорон его родителей. Этот жирный и уродливый девственник без гроша в кармане осознал, что его жизнь подошла к концу. Затем он понял, что его жизнь вообще могла бы быть намного лучше, если бы тот мог избавиться от тёмных страниц своей жизни. Пребывая в сожалениях, мужчина увидел, как грузовик со спящим водителем быстро надвигается на трёх школьников. Собрав все свои силы, он попытался спасти их и погиб.  \r\n  \r\nА открыв глаза, он обнаружил, что переродился в мире меча и магии как Рудеус Грейрат. Получив в этом мире новую жизнь, Рудеус решил, что в этот раз проживёт свою жизнь на полную, безо всяких сожалений!  \r\n  \r\nИ так началось приключение человека, пожелавшего заново начать свою жизнь.  \r\n  \r\nAlternative Raw: \u003chttp://seiga.nicovideo.jp/comic/23831\u003e"},"links":{"al":"85564","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B0753GCX24","ap":"mushoku-tensei-jobless-reincarnation","bw":"series/153747","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-1707946","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/266834","engtl":"http://www.sevenseasentertainment.com/series/mushoku-tensei-jobless-reincarnation","kt":"25541","mal":"70259","mu":"110083","nu":"mushoku-tensei","raw":"https://comic-walker.com/contents/detail/KDCW_MF01000009010000_68"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"0bc90acb-ccc1-44ca-a34a-b9f3a73259d0","name":{"en":"Reincarnation"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"a1f53773-c69a-4ce5-8cab-fffcd90b1565","name":{"en":"Magic"}},{"id":"aafb99c1-7f60-43fa-b75f-fc9502ce29c7","name":{"en":"Harem"}},{"id":"ace04997-f6bd-436e-b261-779182193d3d","name":{"en":"Isekai"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f4122d1c-3b44-44d0-9936-ff7502c39ad3","name":{"en":"Adaptation"}}]}

No necesitamos prolongar un matrimonio no deseado, ¿verdad?\"\n\n\"¿Un... matrimonio no deseado?\"\n\nAturdido siguió repitiendo mis palabras.\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%8B%A4%EC%A0%95%ED%95%9C-%EA%B7%B8%EB%8C%80%EB%A5%BC-%EC%A7%80%ED%82%A4%EB%8A%94-%EB%B0%A9%EB%B2%95/2485), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/56704518)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* English: [Radish](https://radishfiction.com/stories/17978), [Tapas](https://tapas.io/series/saving-my-sweetheart/info)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%8F%AA%E6%83%B3%E5%AE%88%E8%AD%B7%E6%BA%AB%E6%9F%94%E7%9A%84%E4%BD%A0/171)\n* [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/la-sainte-et-le-dragon)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Way-to-Protect-the-Lovable-You/129)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/72384)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%9B%E0%B8%81%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%B9%E0%B9%89%E0%B9%81%E0%B8%AA%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5/157)","fr":"Fille de la Sainte de l’Empire, elle a passé sa vie brimée par sa mère qui l’accuse de lui voler ses pouvoirs. Son plan: faire de sa fille la malédiction qui détruira la lignée de ses ennemis. Mais cette dernière, qui a finalement trouvé l'amour avec son mari, est anéantie par sa mort. Tangannya menggenggam bahu Leticia gemetar dengan faze manis, tapi dia tidak memperhatikan. \"Aku tahu kau tidak nyaman. Tapi tolong bersabarlah denganku sampai ibuku datang.\" Dietrian membenci Leticia. Itu wajar karena ibu Leticia membunuh keluarganya. Dia tidak pernah meragukan faktanya. Jadi dia tidak tahu, betapa buruk wajahnya terdistorsi oleh kata-katanya. \"Anda hanya perlu bertahan dengan saya selama setengah tahun. Born into the wealthy Haesung Group conglomerate, hated by his family, and prone to violent tantrums, the character’s fated to be manipulated and killed. To escape his doom, the new Yuseong finds a way to become one of the Awakened, those gifted with supernatural powers. He’ll try to level up and climb the ranks, defeating monsters in different dimensions… and his enemies at the same time.\n\n---\n\n**Links:**\n- [Original Webtoon (Kakao Webtoon)](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EB%82%98-%ED%98%BC%EC%9E%90-%EC%86%8C%EC%84%A4-%EC%86%8D-%EB%A7%9D%EB%82%98%EB%8B%88/2409)\n- [Official Japanese Translation](https://piccoma.com/web/product/63886)\n- [Official Thai Translation](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A1%E0%B8%B7%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%9C%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%9B%E0%B9%87%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%B1%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%98%E0%B8%9E%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%B8%E0%B8%A2%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%A7%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%99%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%A2%E0%B8%B2%E0%B8%A2/141)","es":"Luego de trabajar horas extras durante varias noches, me quedé dormido por un rato. What captures Kotobuki’s attention is the guy she sees in the window of the store. His name is Hodaka-san, and he is the owner of the store and designs all the clothes sold there. Kotobuki has a serious crush on Hodaka-san, and spends a lot of her time at the cafe across the street just watching him work through the store window.\n\nThings change one day when Hodaka and 2 of his friends actually got to the cafe too, and ask to sit at Kotobuki’s table because the other seats are all taken. Kotobuki lies to the guys about her age, claiming to be 20 years old and in college. Hodaka-san is 26 years old, and Kotobuki is worried that because she is only 14, he will not like her. Kotobuki is thrilled when Hodaka’s friends start teasing her and ask her which of them she would like as a boyfriend, she immediately chooses Hodaka-san. The guys laugh and dub Kotobuki as Hodaka’s girlfriend. After that, Kotobuki hangs around the shop more often, and even works there sometimes, all the while pretending to be older than she is. Eventually though, things are discovered, and the relationship between Kotobuki and Hodaka becomes very strained. Kotobuki is so much younger than Hodaka, will it ever work out? bdd0efcb-b281-4f7e-a510-139190ac52ec:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"bdd0efcb-b281-4f7e-a510-139190ac52ec","title":{"en":"Speed Taro"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"スピードたろう"},{"ja-ro":"Supīdotarou"}],"lastChapter":"113","description":{"en":"[Additional Purchase Link](https://7net.omni7.jp/detail/1100927153)\n\n(from wikipedia.ja):\n\n**Plot** - \n The country of Dolmania has been collecting gold coins from all over the world, even stealing them. Taro learns of this by chance and is targeted by the Dolmanians. After repeatedly running and being chased, Taro is caught and taken to Dolmania. Taro is sentenced to death, but is saved by the country's princess.\n\n That night, the poor neighboring kingdom of Crocodia kidnaps the princess to blackmail Dolmania. Taro rescues the princess and is trusted by the king, who appoints him a colonel in the army. Soon after, a certain count claims retaliation against Crocodia, but is opposed by Taro and his friends. This count is the mastermind behind the gold coin collection.\n\n The count rebels, imprisons the king and princess, and tries to become king himself. The Count wages war against the crocodile, but loses, thanks in part to Taro's efforts. The Count flees the country, forms a gang, and steals Dormania's crown. Taro recovers the crown and traps and captures the Count. Having brought peace, Taro returns to Japan with a jewel from the princess.\n\n**Overview** - \n\n Speed Taro began serialization in Yomiuri Sunday Manga, a supplement to the Sunday edition of the Yomiuri Shimbun, in December 1930, moved to Yomiuri Shonen Shimbun in the middle of the series, and ended in February 1934. Total length of 113 pages; a boxed, multicolored, gorgeous single-volume edition was published by Daiichi Shobo in 1935.\n\n The story depicts the exploits of a boy named \"Taro,\" who, with a bear and a monkey as companions, engages in various battles with rogues in various settings, such as in the mountains and on a boat. The manga is replete with comedic action and fantastical scientific props throughout, such as Taro and his friends sliding upside down with ski boards on their heads and flying vertical takeoff and landing planes from a secret base in pursuit of their enemies.\n\n The manga used techniques previously unseen in Japanese manga, such as close-ups, long shots, and other cinematic compositions, framing, and perspective changes. For example, in the scene where the thugs try to cut the rope suspending Taro in a high place, after depicting the suspended Taro and the ground below him from a bird's eye view, a long shot from below depicts Taro in a small size to heighten the sense of fear. Then, a close-up depicts the bad guy's knife being applied to the pinned rope, creating a sense of urgency.\n\n The success of this work led to the proliferation of newspaper serialization of children's manga and illustrated stories for children, and newspapers began to play a major role in the distribution of manga and illustrated stories in the early Showa period.\n\n**Addendum** -\n\n As mentioned in the *Overview* Speed Taro is an early work considered to be or possess elements of a Long-Form Story Manga (a term still used by Mangaka to this day). \n\nThis term is used to describe works like Tezuka's **[New Treasure Island](https://mangadex.org/title/63487511-434d-4a98-a1da-13bf80e9fcb8/new-treasure-island-1947)**, works in where a mix of varying compositions and panel layouts (in contrast to 4Koma) would communicate, well, a long form story (Though New Treasure Island is a work that makes  use of 2/3 panels per page).\n\nMany Manga Scholars in Japan have discrepancy when Osamu Tezuka is the only subject of discussion in refence to Early Post-War Manga, or Early Manga period. Not to be mistaken for dismissal, Manga Scholars emphasize that many other mangaka, in addition to Tezuka also had their part to play from the Early Post-War period and onwards."},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/%E3%82%B9%E3%83%94%E3%83%BC%E3%83%89%E5%A4%AA%E9%83%8E-%E5%B0%91%E5%B9%B4%E5%B0%91%E8%AA%AC%E5%A4%A7%E7%B3%BB-%E5%AE%8D%E6%88%B8%E5%B7%A6%E8%A1%8C/dp/4380885496/ref=monarch_sidesheet","raw":"https://ekizo.mandarake.co.jp/auction/item/itemInfoJa.html?index=509132"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"safe","tags":[{"id":"07251805-a27e-4d59-b488-f0bfbec15168","name":{"en":"Thriller"}},{"id":"256c8bd9-4904-4360-bf4f-508a76d67183","name":{"en":"Sci-Fi"}},{"id":"391b0423-d847-456f-aff0-8b0cfc03066b","name":{"en":"Action"}},{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"3de8c75d-8ee3-48ff-98ee-e20a65c86451","name":{"en":"Animals"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5ca48985-9a9d-4bd8-be29-80dc0303db72","name":{"en":"Crime"}},{"id":"5fff9cde-849c-4d78-aab0-0d52b2ee1d25","name":{"en":"Survival"}},{"id":"85daba54-a71c-4554-8a28-9901a8b0afad","name":{"en":"Mafia"}},{"id":"87cc87cd-a395-47af-b27a-93258283bbc6","name":{"en":"Adventure"}},{"id":"92d6d951-ca5e-429c-ac78-451071cbf064","name":{"en":"Office Workers"}},{"id":"ac72833b-c4e9-4878-b9db-6c8a4a99444a","name":{"en":"Military"}},{"id":"b29d6a3d-1569-4e7a-8caf-7557bc92cd5d","name":{"en":"Gore"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"da2d50ca-3018-4cc0-ac7a-6b7d472a29ea","name":{"en":"Delinquents"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}},{"id":"ee968100-4191-4968-93d3-f82d72be7e46","name":{"en":"Mystery"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

bde97935-8be2-489e-842d-3d36cc18b0c3:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"bde97935-8be2-489e-842d-3d36cc18b0c3","title":{"en":"Psyche, Plucking the Wind"},"altTitles":[{"ja-ro":"Kaze wo Tsumu Psyche"},{"ja":"風を摘むプシケ"}],"description":{"en":"(from mangapedia):\nA winsome woman who loves movies eventually makes a name for herself as a top producer, despite facing a series of harsh realities in the film and television film industry. Centered on the successes and setbacks of the main character, the film also weaves in themes such as love, friendship, and women's advancement in society, depicting people and the film industry from various aspects. It was serialized in \"Big Comic FOR LADY\" from  October 1982 to March 1985. It was written by Masao Yajima.\n\nKeiko Akiniwa was antagonized by her juniors in her university film club because of her dogmatic attitude, but she was more passionate about movies than anyone else. After graduating from college, Keiko found a job at Hinode Eiga Shuppansha, a company that was trying to recover from bankruptcy, and together with Uozumi, a former board member, she set her sights on publishing a film magazine. Keiko then meets Eishin Maruyama, a film director, and learns about the reality of the film industry.\n\nMore info [here.](https://mangapedia.com/%E9%A2%A8%E3%82%92%E6%91%98%E3%82%80%E3%83%97%E3%82%B7%E3%82%B1-gpouoqq4h)"},"links":{"amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/-/en/%E6%B1%A0%E7%94%B0-%E7%90%86%E4%BB%A3%E5%AD%90/dp/B00BXVZBDQ/ref=monarch_sidesheet","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-343689"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"josei","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}

be1f3013-7260-4f97-b037-2c6829619ad3:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"be1f3013-7260-4f97-b037-2c6829619ad3","title":{"en":"Garden"},"lastChapter":"7","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"\"Garden\" is a collection of Furuya Usamaru's “indie” shorts that were published in Comic Cue, Manga Erotics and GARO respectively. The title is obviously a reference to Hieronymus Bosch’s famous triptych The Garden of Earthly Delights, with the first story being a homage to said painting. The other stories range from absurd comedies to fantasy to horror. It’s a very eclectic mixture, but make no mistake: artistically, Garden might just be Furuya’s most accomplished work after The Music of Marie."},"links":{"al":"48196","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/dp/4872572041/","ap":"garden-usamaru-furuya","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/338960/","kt":"5946","mal":"18196","mu":"51408","raw":"https://www.cmoa.jp/title/105927/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"3b60b75c-a2d7-4860-ab56-05f391bb889c","name":{"en":"Psychological"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"cdad7e68-1419-41dd-bdce-27753074a640","name":{"en":"Horror"}},{"id":"cdc58593-87dd-415e-bbc0-2ec27bf404cc","name":{"en":"Fantasy"}},{"id":"f8f62932-27da-4fe4-8ee1-6779a8c5edba","name":{"en":"Tragedy"}}]}

I'll teach you how to save yourself from those dangers, you moron!\" So says Dangerous Jiisan, always looking out for his grandson. But, lacking any common sense, he usually makes things catastrophically worse in ridiculous, funny ways.  \n  \nIt's a children's gag comedy largely done in manzai style (funny man vs. straight man). Most of the jokes are silly, with ridiculous occurrences, puns, poking fun at popular culture, and breaking the fourth wall, but there is some subtle humor in places, too. Zettaizetsumei Denjarasu Jiisan received the 2005 Shogakukan Manga Award for children's manga."},"links":{"ap":"zettaizetsumei-denjarasu-jiisan","kt":"41654","mal":"89073","mu":"19447"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"shounen","contentRating":"suggestive","tags":[{"id":"0a39b5a1-b235-4886-a747-1d05d216532d","name":{"en":"Award Winning"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}}]}

be361a8f-a813-4fa4-8eea-c629ad0a98aa:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"be361a8f-a813-4fa4-8eea-c629ad0a98aa","title":{"en":"The Heiress's Double Life"},"altTitles":[{"ko":"공녀님의 이중생활"},{"ko-ro":"Gongnyeonimui Ijungsaenghwal"},{"en":"The Heiress' Double Life"},{"en":"The Princess' Double Life"},{"fr":"La double vie de la princesse"},{"es":"La doble vida de la princesa"},{"ru":"Двойная жизнь принцессы"},{"th":"ชีวิตใหม่ของเลดี้จอมเจ้าเล่ห์"},{"ja":"お嬢様の二重生活"},{"vi":"Cuộc sống mới của công nương"},{"zh":"公女的双重生活"},{"zh":"公女大人的二重生活"},{"zh-hk":"天才詐欺犯的雙重身分"},{"ar":"حياة الأميرة المزدوجة"},{"id":"The Princess's Double Life"},{"id":"Ganteng-ganteng seringdigoublogin"}],"availableTranslatedLanguages":["pl","en","fr"],"description":{"ar":"“مرحبًا ، عليك مساعدتي.” “ما الذي يمكنني مساعدتك به؟” “أريد أن أصبح إمبراطورًا.” … ماذا؟ ” ···ماذا او ما؟ عار العائلة الإمبراطورية ، كلاب الشمال المجنونة ، الطغاة في ساحة المعركة. كيف أجعل عقلي أكثر قوة؟ “يجب أن تجد طريقة لتجعلني إمبراطورًا ، وإلا فإنك ستموت فقط.” تمسكها بمهمة نجاة مع احتمال رهيبة للنجاح ، وتريد البقاء على قيد الحياة بأمان! تحويل الفوضى الإمبراطورية إلى إمبراطور! أنت تعلم أنني يجب أن أعمل بدلاً من المواعدة ، أليس كذلك؟ أيمكنك سماعي معك هكذا ، قلبي ينبض مثل طفل مجنون. إنه أثر جانبي سام ، أليس كذلك؟ “” وعندما أراك ، تستمر هذه الأيدي المجنونة في الارتعاش. أريد أن ألمسك بهذا الشكل ، لكن يدي ريكسيد ترتعشان. شعرت به وهو يمسك بقبضتيه. “أخشى أن يساء فهمك ، لكنني لا أعني أنني أريد أن أتأوه بجسدك.” “أه نعم.”\n\n---\nالمحتالة العبقرية \"فايبر\" ، مجدفة الموت التي قلبت الإمبراطورية ، اقتربت من طاغية ساحة المعركة الدوق الأكبر هيسن ، ذات يوم. \"مرحبا ، عليك مساعدتي قليلاً.\" \"كيف يمكنني مساعدك؟\" \"سأحاول مواجهة الإمبراطور.\" \"....ماذا او ما؟\" \".... حسنا؟\" العار الإمبراطوري ، كلب الشمال المجنون ، طاغية ساحة المعركة. عندما يتكون دماغه من عضلات ، ما الذي يمكن فعله؟ \"يجب أن تجد طريقة لتجعلني إمبراطورة خلاف ذلك ، إنه مجرد موت \". تم القبض عليها من خلال شغفها بالبقاء على قيد الحياة ، وكل هذا يعتمد على احتمالية نجاح مهمة البقاء القصوى هذه! دعونا نحول هذا الوغد الملكي إلى إمبراطور! كما تعلم ... نحن نعمل ، لا نتواعد ، أليس كذلك؟ \"هل تسمع هذا؟ قلبي ينبض مثل لقيطة مجنونة عندما أكون معك. إنه من الآثار الجانبية السامة أليس كذلك؟ \" \".....\" \"وعندما أراك ، يتأرجح هذا الرسغ المجنون أيضًا. أعتقد أنه يريد أن ألمسك بهذا الشكل \". اهتزت يد ريكسيد على ظهرها. شعرت بقبضته مشدودة. \"في حال أسأت الفهم ، أقول لك ، لا أقصد الرغبة في التحرش بك.\" \"أن نعم.\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/55373385)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EA%B3%B5%EB%85%80%EB%8B%98%EC%9D%98-%EC%9D%B4%EC%A4%91%EC%83%9D%ED%99%9C/2692), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/57857138)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://tapas.io/series/the-heiresss-double-life)\n* [Chinese (Simplified) / 汉语](https://www.podoteng.com/)\n* [Chinese (Traditional) / 漢語](https://tw.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E5%A4%A9%E6%89%8D%E8%A9%90%E6%AC%BA%E7%8A%AF%E7%9A%84%E9%9B%99%E9%87%8D%E8%BA%AB%E5%88%86/303)\n* [French / Français](https://fr.piccoma.com/fr/product/292)\n* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://id.kakaowebtoon.com/content/The-Princesss-Double-Life/19)\n* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/86756)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://th.kakaowebtoon.com/content/%E0%B8%8A%E0%B8%B5%E0%B8%A7%E0%B8%B4%E0%B8%95%E0%B9%83%E0%B8%AB%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%82%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%87%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B8%94%E0%B8%B5%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%88%E0%B8%AD%E0%B8%A1%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%88%E0%B9%89%E0%B8%B2%E0%B9%80%E0%B8%A5%E0%B9%88%E0%B8%AB%E0%B9%8C/410)","en":"Rexid van Hexen, prince of the Hexen Empire and feared defender of the border, wants to become emperor. But because his brain doesn't even come close to his brawn, he enlists the help of the \"Viper,\" a notorious swindler and master of disguise. With her life on the line, the Viper must now pull off her greatest scam while posing as... Rexid's heiress? Will the unlikely duo succeed, or will they end up being deceived themselves?\n\n---\nA genius of disguise. A master of escape. One day, Grand Duke Hexen, the Tyrant of the Battlefield, came to see the genius swindler and death-row prisoner, 'Viper,' who stirred up the Empire.\n\n\"Hey, you need to help me.\"\n\n\"How can I help you?\"\n\n\"I need to try becoming the emperor once in my life.\"\n\n\"...Huh?\"\n\n'...You?' The *Imperial Family's Disgrace*, *Crazy Northern Dog*, and *Tyrant of the Battlefield*. What can I do to help someone when even their brain is made of muscle?\n\n\"You must find a way for me to become the emperor. Or else you'll be put to death.\"\n\nA chance given to her who wants to survive. A survival mission with an abysmal success rate! Make the black sheep of the imperial family into the emperor! We... You know that we have to work rather than have some romance, right?\n\n\"Can you hear it? My heart started beating like a crazy person's since you stuck to me like this. It's a side effect of the poison, right?\"\n\n\"...\"\n\n\"And when I see you, this crazy wrist keeps twitching. I think it wants to... touch you just like this...\"\n\nRexid's hand which touched my back trembled. Elle se fait délibérément arrêter et enfermer au camp pour criminels de Drax. C'est la veille de son évasion, qu'elle reçoit dans sa cellule la visite de Rexid Van Hessen, le troisième prince de l'empire qui après avoir entendu les rumeurs selon lesquelles elle serait très intelligente décide de lui demander de l'aide afin qu'il devienne empereur.\n\nMalgré que le nombre de candidats avant lui pouvant accéder au trône ne soit que de deux, la nature de Rexid à agir sans réfléchir et à être violent et agressif sans se préoccuper des lois l'envoie dans les terres du Nord pour combattre.\n\nSi elle ne veut pas être exécutée et bénéficier d'une belle vie sans difficulté d'être soignée, nourrit ou logée, Viper doit accepter d'aider Rexid à devenir empereur, et puisqu'elle n'a rien pas le choix, la femme accepte même si pour elle cet homme qui malgré la possession d'un cerveau ne s'en sert pas ne pourra jamais gouverner l'empire.\n\n---\n[Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/content/55373385)\n\n**Original Webtoon:** Little does he know that all the residents there harbor secrets…but what are they? And, does Fuji have a secret of his own...?\n\n---\n\nPeculiar tales of an apartment complex filled to bursting with bewitching, intertwining, and twisted human relationships.","vi":"Một nơi chỉ toàn những “kỳ nhân dị sĩ”.\nVào cuối thời Taisho, Fuji, một dịch giả chuyển đến Chung cư Kaika đầy hoa lệ. But the world is mysterious and she gains a second chance at life. She wakes up from the pain and it is two days before her twenty-first birthday. Marianne meets her father who had left the world in her previous life. But one day, one of the four great demons, the Venom Demon, discovered that he was special and kidnapped him. After all kinds of tests, he decided to raise him as his disciple. Ten years later, Jin Sohan tried to look for traces of the Mystic Lunar Dance Troupe, but the Sword Dance Troupe had already been destroyed at the hands of the Unorthodox Faction that’s now ruling over his hometown.\n\n---\nKidnapped as a child to be trained in the art of poison, Sohan Jin returns to his hometown in search of the group of New Moon Sword Dancers who raised him. However, upon his return, Sohan discovers the sword dancers have been defeated by a nefarious sect that now rules the area, with some members having been abducted. What would have been a heartwarming reunion transforms into a quest for revenge as Sohan begins his search for the remaining sword dancers, and he’s willing to poison anyone who gets in his way.\n\n---\n**Original Novel:** [Chapters](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5612093), [Volumes](https://series.naver.com/novel/detail.series?productNo=5612161)\n\n**Original be8cbeb5-8626-45a4-9163-3db638eb5e32:::||@!@||:::2023-11-01T10:00:00:::||@!@||:::{"id":"be8cbeb5-8626-45a4-9163-3db638eb5e32","title":{"en":"Folklore Series"},"altTitles":[{"ja":"民話シリーズ"},{"ja-ro":"Minwa Shiriizu"}],"lastChapter":"5","availableTranslatedLanguages":["en"],"description":{"en":"A series of 5 'picture book' manga for very young children, Ishinomori crafts his own tales that fit right at home with well-known Japanese folklore, gracing them with dozens and dozens of gorgeously done two-page spreads.\n\n- **Child of the Stars** - Hikaru is a boy of mysterious parentage, said to have come down from the stars. One day, Hikaru comes to face an oni with his own reason for attacking Hikaru, one connected to Hikaru's past.\n- **The Dragon's Whiskers** - Taro's mother is ill, but legend has it that if she drinks a boiled dragon's whisker, her illness will be cured. Taro goes on his quest to obtain this whisker.\n- **Tale of the 1000 Year-Old Cedar** - A tengu father suddenly finds himself responsible for several human children. That is, the crown prince's miracle power—the tears of blessing. Unfortunately, no matter what she did, he didn't shed a single tear…\n\n---\nThe last thing Lady Rivera wants to do is marry the crown prince of the Lacrima Empire, Ranke Sol Reggenatore. The problem is that his nasty temper and frigid manners have already chased off every other young lady eligible for the title of crown princess! The only way she'll get out of this marriage is by making the icy prince cry and collecting his magical \"tears of blessing.\" And to make matters worse, a tragic event in Ranke's past forced him to lock his emotions away deep within his heart, leaving Rivera with a seemingly impossible mission on her hands. Now, as she spends more time with him, she's realizing that there's more to him than meets the eye... Can Rivera break down this perpetually dry-eyed prince without getting her own feelings involved?\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6749585), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=784845)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/cry-for-me-crown-prince)\n* [French / Français](https://www.webtoons.com/fr/fantasy/cry-for-me-crown-prince/list?title_no=3835)\n* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.webtoons.com/th/romantic-fantasy/cry-for-me-crown-prince/list?title_no=3989)","es":"Después de tener el peor primer encuentro con el Príncipe Heredero, descubrió una forma de evitar este matrimonio. Sau cuộc gặp đầu tiên đầy tồi tệ với Thái Tử, cô đã phát hiện ra cách để thoát khỏi cuộc hôn nhân này. Đó là sức mạnh kỳ diệu của thái tử — giọt nước mắt của phước lành. Nhưng Thái Tử là người mà nước mắt không chảy ra ngay cả khi bị đâm...\nVị vua hiện tại đã giết vị vua trước đó. Cô ấy đã ở bên Thái tử vì những giọt nước mắt kỳ diệu của anh ấy.\nChứng kiến ​​cảnh tượng và lời nói hấp hối của mẹ - Thái tử mất khả năng khóc.\n\nCha mẹ Rivera mất khi cô còn nhỏ, cô bị đuổi ra khỏi nhà. Cô ấy cuối cùng được nhận nuôi bởi một đại quý tộc.\nRivera muốn thoát ra khỏi cuộc đính hôn với Thái tử nên đã cố tình phóng thích và bỏ trốn cùng với chim thần (Bảo vật của hoàng tộc), đó là một tội. Rivera thà ngồi ngục, mất tư cách Thái tử phi. Thái tử bắt giữ cô ấy và ngăn cản cô. Thái tử bắt cô vào ngục Rivera. Rivera hoảng sợ trong nhà ngục kỳ lạ.\nNhị Hoàng tử đã giúp Rivera ra khỏi ngục. Nhị Hoàng tử nói với Rivera cách duy nhất để phá vỡ hôn ước là Rivera đưa nước mắt của Thái tử cho đức vua hiện tại. Nhị Hoàng tử yêu cầu Rivera giữ bí mật về thỏa thuận của họ. Thái tử phát hiện cuộc trò chuyện của họ. Thái tử có thái độ thù địch với Nhị hoàng tử.\n\n---\n**Original Webtoon:** [Naver Series](https://series.naver.com/comic/detail.series?productNo=6749585), [Naver Webtoon](https://comic.naver.com/webtoon/list?titleId=784845)\n\n**Official Translations:**\n* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/cry-for-me-crown-prince)\n* [French / One day they come to his school to give him his lunch, he gets annoyed due to the atmosphere and explodes on them, to counter attack his anger they confess their tender feelings for him in front of everyone and leave. Feeling sorry he chases after them and says that he'll study hard in order to get in the same highschool as them.","it":"La storia di Kissxsis inizia con lo studente Keita Suminoe alle prese con gli esami di ingresso per le scuole superiori. I genitori dei tre ragazzi incoraggiano Keita ad accettare le attenzioni di una delle due sorelle, e Keita nonostante l'imbarazzo non disdegna l'interesse delle due ragazze nei suoi confronti. Embora se considerem irmãos eles não compartilham relação sanguínea; seus pais se casaram enquanto eles estavam na infância. Ainda assim, a relação incomoda Keita profundamente, já que seus pais permitem essa relação, e visto que foram criados juntos, e escandaliza à grande parte dos que vêm a saber desta. As gêmeas, contudo, são insistentes, e fazem o possível e o impossível para ficar com ele. Nessa conjuntura, entram outros personagens que possuem esse mesmo interesse, e a trama se desenrola em cima da disputa por Keita.","pt-br":"Keita tem duas meias-irmãs (sem parentesco) que o amam de uma forma lasciva e não têm problemas em expressar isso, elas até gostam de competir por isso; para as risadas de seus amigos (o que ele geralmente suporta sem problemas). Um dia, elas vêm à escola dele para lhe dar seu almoço, ele fica irritado devido à atmosfera e explode com elas, para contra-atacar sua raiva, elas confessam seus sentimentos ternos por ele na frente de todos e vão embora. Sentindo pena, ele corre atrás delas e diz que vai estudar muito para entrar na mesma escola que elas."},"links":{"al":"33048","amz":"https://www.amazon.co.jp/gp/product/B074C6W8VD","ap":"kiss-x-sis","bw":"series/4372","cdj":"https://www.cdjapan.co.jp/product/NEOBK-2666213","ebj":"https://ebookjapan.yahoo.co.jp/books/122233","kt":"6532","mal":"3048","mu":"7109","raw":"https://magazine.yanmaga.jp/c/kiss_sis/"},"originalLanguage":"ja","publicationDemographic":"seinen","contentRating":"erotica","tags":[{"id":"423e2eae-a7a2-4a8b-ac03-a8351462d71d","name":{"en":"Romance"}},{"id":"4d32cc48-9f00-4cca-9b5a-a839f0764984","name":{"en":"Comedy"}},{"id":"5bd0e105-4481-44ca-b6e7-7544da56b1a3","name":{"en":"Incest"}},{"id":"aafb99c1-7f60-43fa-b75f-fc9502ce29c7","name":{"en":"Harem"}},{"id":"b9af3a63-f058-46de-a9a0-e0c13906197a","name":{"en":"Drama"}},{"id":"caaa44eb-cd40-4177-b930-79d3ef2afe87","name":{"en":"School Life"}},{"id":"e5301a23-ebd9-49dd-a0cb-2add944c7fe9","name":{"en":"Slice of Life"}}]}
